info.name: Bambite E-commerce API
info.description: Complete API collection for Bambite E-commerce Backend with Authentication (httpOnly cookies), Orders, Inventory, Staff Management, Staff Accounts, Permissions, Departments, Payment Management, Job Post Management, Place Tag Management, Job Application Management (with PDF uploads and email notifications), Interview Management, Contact Management, and Product Image Uploads (Cloudinary). All authentication uses httpOnly cookies for security. Postman automatically handles cookies. For API clients, Authorization header with Bearer token is also supported. Product images and job application PDFs are uploaded via multipart/form-data to Cloudinary.

request.description: Login with staff account credentials. Staff must be active to login. Tokens are set in httpOnly cookies automatically (accessToken - 15 min, refreshToken - 7 days). Postman automatically handles cookies. If account has mustChangePassword=true (first login with auto-generated password), login will succeed (200) but tokens will NOT be set in cookies. Instead, response indicates password change is required. Use POST /staff-accounts/change-password endpoint to set a new password, then login again.
Get authenticated staff account profile with permissions

Change staff account password. Can be used WITHOUT authentication for first login (when mustChangePassword=true) by providing email, currentPassword, and newPassword. For authenticated users, provide currentPassword and newPassword (accountId is taken from token, email not needed). After successful password change, mustChangePassword flag is cleared. New password must meet complexity requirements: 8+ chars, uppercase, lowercase, number, special char. After changing password, login again to get tokens in httpOnly cookies.

request.description: Create a new product with images. Uses multipart/form-data. At least one image is REQUIRED. Requires: Admin OR Staff with product_management permission. You can upload multiple images by selecting multiple files in Postman (up to 20 images).

formdata.description: Add new images (optional). New images will be added to existing ones. To replace all images, add query parameter: ?deleteOldImages=true

query.description: Set to 'true' to delete all old images and replace with new ones. Set to 'false' (default) to add new images to existing ones.

request.description: Update product details and/or images. Uses multipart/form-data. All fields are optional. To update only product data without images, use form fields only (no file upload). To update images: include 'images' file field. By default, when new images are uploaded, all old images are deleted from Cloudinary and replaced with new ones. To add new images to existing ones (keep old + add new), set query parameter deleteOldImages=false. To remove all images, set deleteOldImages=true without uploading files. Requires: Admin OR Staff with product_management permission

Create staff account for a staff member. Staff must be active. Password is OPTIONAL - if not provided, a secure 16-character password will be auto-generated and sent via email. If password is provided, it must meet complexity requirements. Account creation email is sent asynchronously with login credentials.
